subcategory.name: List containers
subcategory.description: Responsive list container examples for Tailwind CSS, designed and built by the creators of the framework.
subcategory.introduction: Use these Tailwind CSS list container components to display lists of users, tasks, or any other resource in your application. These components are designed and built by the Tailwind CSS team, and include a variety of different styles and layouts.
